Fort_Collins.Polaris Expeditionary Learning School:
Polaris Expeditionary Learning School is an alternative (school of choice) K-12 school in Fort Collins Colorado (Poudre School District).
Polaris Expeditionary Learning School used to be Pioneer, but had to change its name due to district policy and lack of funding to continue as a charter.
Polaris Expeditionary Learning School has an "Adventure Program" that allows students to go on week-long field trips or "Intensives" in order to gain school credit.
